title: Headed For Catastrophe
content:
Geoengineering:  heading towards a planetary catastrophe in the years ahead Dane Wigington a geoengineering scientist... <!--more--> with a background in solar energy who is highly regarded as one of the foremost experts and commentators on stratospheric aerosol geoengineering and solar radiation management.
  He is a former employee at Bechtel Corporation and worked on the first commercial solar plants in the United States.

As a climate researcher, Dane has been studying the issue of geoengineering and chemtrails for over a decade.  He is featured in Michael Murphy’s new documentary “Why in the World are They Spraying” and hosts the information website GeoEngineering Watch.
